law.catch_line: Pesticide Use As Part Of Supervised Training Programs At Vocational, Technical And Agricultural Schools
law.text: Notwithstanding any other provisions of this chapter, sections 6C to 6I, inclusive, shall not apply to the spraying, release, deposit or application of any pesticide made as a part of a supervised training program at any of the state-aided and approved vocational-technical or agricultural schools in the commonwealth.
